file.name: rest-openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
    parameters:
        catalogIdQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: catalogId
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
        externalReferenceCodePathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: externalReferenceCode
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource external reference code
                example: AB-34098-789-N
                minLength: 1
                type: string
            style: simple
        idPathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: id
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource Id
                example: 30130
                format: int64
                minimum: 0
                type: integer
            style: simple
        mappedProductIdPathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: mappedProductId
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource Id
                example: 30130
                format: int64
                minimum: 0
                type: integer
            style: simple
        pageQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: page
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
        pageSizeQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: pageSize
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
        pinIdPathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: pinId
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource Id
                example: 30130
                format: int64
                minimum: 0
                type: integer
            style: simple
        productIdPathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: productId
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource Id
                example: 30130
                format: int64
                minimum: 0
                type: integer
            style: simple
        searchQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: search
            required: false
            schema:
                type: string
            style: form
        sequencePathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: sequence
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The sequence of the pin
                example: 12c
                minLength: 1
                type: string
            style: simple
    responses:
        NotFound:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                The specified resource was not found
        UnauthorizedError:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                Authentication information is missing or invalid
    schemas:
        Attachment:
            properties:
                attachment:
                    description:
                        Base64 enoded file
                    type: string
                cdnEnabled:
                    type: boolean
                cdnURL:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                contentType:
                    description:
                        Content type of attachment
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomField"
                    type: array
                displayDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expirationDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                options:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        color: yellow
                        optionKey: optionValueKey
                        size: xs
                    type: object
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
                src:
                    description:
                        URL of the location
                    type: string
                title:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Attachment Title HR
                        hu_HU: Attachment Title HU
                    type: object
                type:
                    format: int32
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            type: object
        AttachmentBase64:
            properties:
                attachment:
                    description:
                        Base64 encoded file
                    type: string
                contentType:
                    description:
                        Content type of attachment
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomField"
                    type: array
                displayDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expirationDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                options:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        color: yellow
                        optionKey: optionValueKey
                        size: xs
                    type: object
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
                src:
                    description:
                        URL of the location
                    type: string
                title:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Attachment Title HR
                        hu_HU: Attachment Title HU
                    type: object
                type:
                    format: int32
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            type: object
        AttachmentUrl:
            properties:
                contentType:
                    description:
                        Content type of attachment
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomField"
                    type: array
                displayDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expirationDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                options:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        color: yellow
                        optionKey: optionValueKey
                        size: xs
                    type: object
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
                src:
                    description:
                        URL of the location
                    type: string
                title:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Attachment Title HR
                        hu_HU: Attachment Title HU
                    type: object
                type:
                    format: int32
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            type: object
        Catalog:
            properties:
                actions:
                    additionalProperties:
                        additionalProperties:
                            type: string
                        type: object
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                currencyCode:
                    example: USD
                    type: string
                defaultLanguageId:
                    example: en_US
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                name:
                    description:
                        Category Name
                    type: string
                system:
                    example: false
                    readOnly: true
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - name
            type: object
        Category:
            properties:
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                name:
                    description:
                        Category Name
                    type: string
                siteId:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                vocabulary:
                    example: Default Vocabulary
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
            required:
                - id
            type: object
        CustomField:
            # @review
            description:
                Represents the value of each custom field. Fields can contain different information types (e.g.,
                geolocation, strings, etc.).
            properties:
                customValue:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomValue"
                dataType:
                    description:
                        The field type (e.g., image, text, etc.).
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                name:
                    description:
                        The field's internal name. This is valid for comparisons and unique in the structured content.
                    type: string
        CustomValue:
            properties:
                data:
                    description:
                        The field's content for simple types.
                    type: object
                data_i18n:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    type: object
                geo:
                    allOf:
                        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Geo"
                    description:
                        A point determined by latitude and longitude.
            type: object
        Diagram:
            properties:
                attachmentBase64:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/AttachmentBase64"
                color:
                    example: black
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                imageId:
                    example: 33132
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                imageURL:
                    example: Name 1
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                productExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: exampleERC
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                productId:
                    example: 33131
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                radius:
                    example: 33.54
                    format: double
                    type: number
                type:
                    example: default
                    type: string
            type: object
        Error:
            properties:
                errorCode:
                    description:
                        Internal error code mapping
                    example: 996
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                errorDescription:
                    example: Unable to find currency. Currency code should be expressed with
                        3-letter ISO 4217 format.
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                message:
                    example: No CommerceCurrency exists with the key {catalogId=41811, code=US
                        Dollar}
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    description:
                        HTTP Status code
                    example: 404
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            required:
                - errorCode
                - errorDescription
                - message
                - status
            type: object
        Geo:
            description:
                A point determined by latitude and longitude.
            properties:
                latitude:
                    description:
                        The latitude of a point in space.
                    format: double
                    type: number
                longitude:
                    description:
                        The longitude of a point in space.
                    format: double
                    type: number
            type: object
        MappedProduct:
            properties:
                actions:
                    additionalProperties:
                        additionalProperties:
                            type: string
                        type: object
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                customFields:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomField"
                    type: array
                id:
                    example: 33130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                productExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: exampleERC
                    type: string
                productId:
                    example: 33131
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                productName:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Product Name HR
                        hu_HU: Product Name HU
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                quantity:
                    example: 1
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                sequence:
                    example: 1
                    type: string
                sku:
                    example: SKU01
                    type: string
                skuExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: SKU0111
                    type: string
                skuId:
                    example: 33135
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                type:
                    enum:
                        - diagram
                        - external
                        - sku
                    example: sku
                    type: string
            type: object
        Option:
            properties:
                actions:
                    additionalProperties:
                        additionalProperties:
                            type: string
                        type: object
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                catalogId:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                description:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        hu_HU: Description HU
                        hr_HR: Description HR
                        en_US: Description
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                facetable:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                fieldType:
                    enum:
                        - checkbox
                        - checkbox_multiple
                        - date
                        - numeric
                        - radio
                        - select
                        - text
                    example: select
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                key:
                    example: color
                    type: string
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Color
                        hr_HR: Color HR
                        hu_HU: Color HU
                    type: object
                optionValues:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/OptionValue"
                    type: array
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
                required:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                skuContributor:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - fieldType
                - key
                - name
            type: object
        OptionCategory:
            properties:
                description:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        hu_HU: Horvatorszag
                        hr_HR: Hrvatska
                        en_US: Croatia
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                key:
                    example: oprion-category-key
                    type: string
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                title:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Croatia
                        hr_HR: Hrvatska
                        hu_HU: Horvatorszag
                    type: object
            required:
                - key
                - title
            type: object
        OptionValue:
            properties:
                actions:
                    additionalProperties:
                        additionalProperties:
                            type: string
                        type: object
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                key:
                    example: black
                    type: string
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Black
                        hr_HR: Black HR
                        hu_HU: Black HU
                    type: object
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
            required:
                - key
                - name
            type: object
        Pin:
            properties:
                id:
                    example: 33130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                mappedProduct:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/MappedProduct"
                positionX:
                    example: 33.54
                    format: double
                    type: number
                positionY:
                    example: 33.54
                    format: double
                    type: number
                sequence:
                    example: 1
                    type: string
            type: object
        Product:
            properties:
                actions:
                    additionalProperties:
                        additionalProperties:
                            type: string
                        type: object
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                active:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                attachments:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Attachment"
                    type: array
                catalog:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Catalog"
                    readOnly: true
                catalogId:
                    example: 30054
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                categories:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Category"
                    type: array
                configuration:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductConfiguration"
                createDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomField"
                    type: array
                defaultSku:
                    example: Blue handle, 00001l, 70cm, lifetime warranty
                    type: string
                description:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        hu_HU: Product Description HU
                        hr_HR: Product Description HR
                        en_US: Professional hand stainless steel saw for wood. Made to last and
                            saw forever. Made of best steel
                diagram:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Diagram"
                displayDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expando:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                expirationDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                images:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Attachment"
                    type: array
                mappedProducts:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/MappedProduct"
                    type: array
                metaDescription:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Meta description HU
                        hr_HR: Meta description HU
                        hu_HU: Meta description HU
                    type: object
                metaKeyword:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Meta keyword HU
                        hr_HR: Meta keyword HU
                        hu_HU: Meta keyword HU
                    type: object
                metaTitle:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Meta title HU
                        hr_HR: Meta title HU
                        hu_HU: Meta title HU
                    type: object
                modifiedDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Product Name HR
                        hu_HU: Product Name HU
                    type: object
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                pins:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pin"
                    type: array
                productAccountGroupFilter:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                productAccountGroups:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductAccountGroup"
                    type: array
                productChannelFilter:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                productChannels:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductChannel"
                    type: array
                productConfiguration:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductConfiguration"
                productId:
                    format: int64
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                productOptions:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductOption"
                    type: array
                productSpecifications:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductSpecification"
                    type: array
                productStatus:
                    format: int32
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                productType:
                    example: simple
                    type: string
                productTypeI18n:
                    example: simple
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                relatedProducts:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/RelatedProduct"
                    type: array
                shippingConfiguration:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductShippingConfiguration"
                shortDescription:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand stainless steel saw for wood
                        hr_HR: Product Short Description HR
                        hu_HU: Product Short Description HU
                    type: object
                skuFormatted:
                    example: default
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                skus:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Sku"
                    type: array
                subscriptionConfiguration:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductSubscriptionConfiguration"
                tags:
                    example:
                        - tag1
                        - tag2
                        - tag3
                    items:
                        type: string
                    type: array
                taxConfiguration:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductTaxConfiguration"
                thumbnail:
                    example: simple
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                urls:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: product-url-us
                        hr_HR: product-url-hr
                        hu_HU: product-url-hu
                    type: object
                workflowStatusInfo:
                    allOf:
                        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Status"
                    readOnly: true
            required:
                - active
                - catalogId
                - name
                - productType
            type: object
        ProductAccountGroup:
            properties:
                accountGroupId:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                name:
                    example: Alessio Antonio Rendina
                    type: string
            required:
                - id
            type: object
        ProductChannel:
            properties:
                channelId:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                currencyCode:
                    example: USD
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                name:
                    example: Alessio Antonio Rendina
                    type: string
                type:
                    type: string
            required:
                - id
            type: object
        ProductConfiguration:
            properties:
                allowBackOrder:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                allowedOrderQuantities:
                    example:
                        - 10
                        - 20
                        - 30
                        - 40
                    items:
                        format: int32
                        type: integer
                    type: array
                displayAvailability:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                displayStockQuantity:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                inventoryEngine:
                    description:
                        The inventory engine that will be used to manage the product inventory
                    type: string
                lowStockAction:
                    description:
                        The low stock action that will be performed when a product is out of stock
                    type: string
                maxOrderQuantity:
                    format: int32
                    type: integer
                minOrderQuantity:
                    format: int32
                    type: integer
                minStockQuantity:
                    format: int32
                    type: integer
                multipleOrderQuantity:
                    format: int32
                    type: integer
            type: object
        ProductGroup:
            properties:
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    readOnly: true
                    type: object
                description:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        hu_HU: Description HU
                        hr_HR: Description HR
                        en_US: Description
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                products:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductGroupProduct"
                    type: array
                productsCount:
                    example: 20
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                title:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Title
                        hr_HR: Title HR
                        hu_HU: Title HU
                    type: object
            type: object
        ProductGroupProduct:
            properties:
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                productExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                productGroupExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: DAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                productGroupId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                productId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                productName:
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                sku:
                    example: BL500IC
                    type: string
            type: object
        ProductOption:
            properties:
                catalogId:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                description:
                    type: object
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        hu_HU: Description HU
                        hr_HR: Description HR
                        en_US: Description
                facetable:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                fieldType:
                    example: checkbox, checkbox_multiple, date, numeric, radio, select
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                key:
                    example: color
                    type: string
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Color
                        hr_HR: Color HR
                        hu_HU: Color HU
                    type: object
                optionId:
                    example: 30080
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
                productOptionValues:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProductOptionValue"
                    type: array
                required:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                skuContributor:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - fieldType
                - key
                - name
                - optionId
            type: object
        ProductOptionValue:
            properties:
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                key:
                    example: black
                    type: string
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Black
                        hr_HR: Black HR
                        hu_HU: Black HU
                    type: object
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
            required:
                - key
                - name
            type: object
        ProductShippingConfiguration:
            properties:
                depth:
                    example: 202
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                freeShipping:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                height:
                    example: 202
